conbody.p: BricsCAD comes with a library of more than 1,000 standard mechanical parts available in more than 170,000 different sizes. They are available in the Library panel, and can be drag-and-dropped from the library into your assembly. You can adjust the parameters in the Properties panel, which temporarily lists parameters of the component being inserted. After insertion, parameters can be edited in Mechanical Browser and the Properties panel.

In the Mechanical workspace, the Library panel contains 3 categories:
Standard Parts
Holes
Sheet Metal
